function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Constructed wet environments are the predominant producers of mosquitoes in urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to high mosquito population","Mitigation":"Implement proper water management and movement to reduce mosquito breeding","Technologies":"Pond pumps, waterfalls, fountains, aerators","People":"Urban planners, environmental agencies","Owner":"Urban development authorities"},{"Description":"Urban wetlands and water bodies provide suitable habitat for bird species, increasing the possibility of disease transmission to human populations","Impact":"Risk of transmission of viral vector-borne diseases to nearby human populations","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control bird populations near urban wetlands","Technologies":"Bird deterrents, habitat management","People":"Environmental agencies, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Local government authorities"},{"Description":"Stagnant, shallow water is associated with high mosquito larvae counts in constructed wet environments","Impact":"Increased mosquito larvae counts leading to higher disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Induce sufficient water movement through the use of pond pumps, waterfalls, fountains, or aerators","Technologies":"Pond pumps, waterfalls, fountains, aerators","People":"Urban planners, environmental agencies","Owner":"Urban development authorities"}]}
